name: demo-tech-app
description: Technology company dashboard - Requires backend engine

scripts.test: echo 'Tests must be run through backend engine'
scripts._internal:start: echo 'Starting with backend context...' && node src/index.js
scripts._internal:dev: echo 'Development mode with backend...' && nodemon src/index.js

_comment: This project MUST be run through the backend engine using 'npm run project:DemoTechApp' from root
